body:
If you do the former, we're requiring all initializers to be callable with only two parameters, which I think is not the right thing to do. We can fix this here for compatibility, but it's a hack. 

It may be better if you check whether partition_info is in the arg names of the function, and pass it only if it is. Remove the check for None, which is a distraction.
